firstTime.title: üëã Hi, I'm Luna!
firstTime.intro: I'm your AI-powered wellness companion, here to support you in understanding and managing your health with care, science, and empathy. Whether you're tracking your cycle, looking for reliable clinics nearby, or just curious about your body‚ÄîI'm here for you, anytime.

healthNavigation.title: üè• Health Navigation & Local Services
examples: Where is the nearest women's health clinic open on weekends?

menstrualHealth.title: ü©∏ Menstrual Health & Tracking
examples: Is brown spotting before my period normal?
I have cramps but no period‚Äîwhat could it be?
